name: Spider Hand Funny Prank
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Spider.
Spider Hand Funny Prank - is an application simulation game joke!
To play a trick on your friends, take a picture of a hand and wait for a lot!
Raffle family and friends! It is very scary, and try it yourself!
The interface is very simple, like all!
The game is a joke created for fun and draw!
Thank you for playing our games and applications! Leave us feedback and we will make the game even better and more interesting!
